name: deviceManagement_virtualEndpoint_reports_CreateExportJobs
description: Create a new cloudPcExportJob resource to initiate downloading the entire or specified portion of a report. Use the GET cloudPcExportJob operation to verify the **exportJobStatus** property of the **cloudPcExportJob** resource. When the property becomes `completed`, the report has finished downloading in the location specified by the **exportUrl** property.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**expirationDateTime**: The date and time when the export job expires.
**exportJobStatus**: The status of the export job. The possible values are: notStarted, inProgress, completed, unknownFutureValue. Read-only.
**exportUrl**: The storage account URL of the exported report. It can be used to download the file.
**filter**: The filter applied on the report.
**format**: The format of the exported report.

**reportName**: The report name. The possible values are: remoteConnectionHistoricalReports, dailyAggregatedRemoteConnectionReports, totalAggregatedRemoteConnectionReports, sharedUseLicenseUsageReport, sharedUseLicenseUsageRealTimeReport, or unknownFutureValue.
**requestDateTime**: The date and time when the export job was requested.
**select**: The selected columns of the report.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
